text: hi I'm Curtis Hartman I'm a principal
product manager with AWS today's video
is going to focus on getting started
with Amazon chime business calling the
new feature that lets companies
significantly reduce their telephone
call and cost while improving employee
productivity this is calling enables
enterprise users to place and receive
low-cost phone calls on the public
switched telephone over directly from
within the same chime application that
they use for meetings and chat with
business calling each chime user
receives a direct inward dial business
telephone number and voicemail once your
administrator is enabled business
calling on your account it's easy to use
these features to make a call within the
chime desktop and web application you
access the Dow fat from the quick
actions section or meetings icon when
you place a call you will see a progress
screen with the phone number or contact
you have dialed when the person you're
calling answers you both will be placed
into a two party meeting just like with
chat you can easily add people to the
conversation by simply inviting
additional chime users identified by
their email for other users identified
by their phone number now let's talk
about receiving calls on your chime
business phone number when a caller
dials your chime number you will receive
an incoming call notification on all of
your logged in chime applications across
desktop mobile and web you can answer
the call decline the call sending it to
voicemail or respond with a text message
and you can choose the answer the
incoming call on any device in this case
I answer on my mobile device since I'm
not in the office yet you can also
seamlessly switch between devices while
maintaining a conversation with the
caller and it's example I've now arrived
at the office but I'd like to switch the
call to my desktop to do that I simply
go to the chime desktop app and click on
the active call if you are unable to
take a call chime voicemail will answer
it for you
voicemails are captured and available
within the Amazon chime voicemail
message thread business calling also
enables you to send text and picture
messages to mobile phones via the chime
messaging interface with the same look
and feel as chime chat these text
messages use your business phone number
instead of your personal mobile number
that's a quick overview of chime
business calling thanks for joining us
from
information you can visit our website
